title: Trippy Extreme Close-Ups of Everyday Objects
content:
It is difficult to categorize the kinds of videos that Posy makes â€” they are part science demo and part visual art. His latest video, Household Objects (But Extremely Close), uses a powerful macro lens to look at everyday objects like toothbrushes, sponges, and pencils, turning them into swirling abstract films. His music is lovely too â€” you can find it on Bandcamp.

See also Motion Extraction.
